00084     struct DSORawRecord {
00085         unsigned int numCh;
00086         unsigned int accumCount;
00087         unsigned int recordLength;
00088         int acqCount;
00089         std::vector<int32_t> record;
00090         atomic<int> locked;
00091         bool tryLock() {
00092             return locked.compareAndSet(false, true);
00093         }
00094         void unlock() {
00095             ASSERT(locked);
00096             locked = false;
00097         }
00098     };
